item.description:
The Boston JavaScript Meetup group will meet on Wednesday, February 25th at the Microsoft Research Center New England at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge, MA from 6 to 8 PM.

We are looking for a couple of presenters on JavaScript topics. Ideally you can either bring an interesting problem and explain how you solved it, bring an interesting problem to the group to have them help you solve it, or talk about an interesting new framework or development platform. Proposed topics you can present can be emailed to me at msutherland@waldenrecruiting.com.

We will have full WiFi access and a projector and screen. We are being hosted by Gus Weber of the Microsoft Research Center.

Thanks goes to Meetup member Bryan Wolf for arranging us to meet at the MRC.

Please RSVP for this event using Meetup.com functionality.

Marsh Sutherland
Boston JavaScript Meetup Meeting Organizer


President
Walden Recruiting
We’re not like the other agencies…

P: (877) 8 WALDEN Ext 2
msutherland@waldenrecruiting.com
item.name: Boston JavaScript February Meetup
